item.title: 16th September 2020
item.description: Here itâ€™s presented the first attempt at playing both pieces at 80bpm. There are clear mistakes, but I am also trying to correct the rightâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Here itâ€™s presented the first attempt at playing both pieces at 80bpm.

There are clear mistakes, but I am also trying to correct the right hand grip. Right now I am grabing the bow more like in the Russian method (right side of image), but I am trying to do it like the Franco-Belgian one (left side of image).

Ã‰tude N. 12 Laoureux Book II 80bpm

Concerto Op. 3 N. 6 I. Allegro Vivaldi 80bpm

Suggestion: Watch it at 2x ðŸ˜‰
